title: Augmented Reality-Based Language Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and language education experience
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course for current practitioners to learn how to apply AR technology in language education settings

learning_goals: Augmented reality-based language learning simulations can be designed using the SAM I model
The educational significance of AR content can be assessed by applying a threshold concepts framework
Three or more practical strategies for integrating AR technology into real-world language education scenarios can be proposed
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
